EmailTemplate.subject: Put great healthcare within reach
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The power of virtual care in a difficult market We appreciate you helping to make our session at the SHRM virtual retreat a success, especially in our session led by Kelly Bliss, U.S. Group Health President at Teladoc Health. We hope you'll join us again in September when Kelly will share the results of our Virtual Care Transformation study and the trends we're seeing. In the meantime, if you enjoyed the recent discussion... Get more from Kelly on the next era of virtual care, which focuses on fully integrated care experiences.
Read the article <[[https://www.leadersedge.com/healthcare/a-new-era-of-virtual-care]]> A different approach to primary care is in order. Learn how virtual-first health plans are the next evolution in virtual-first care.
Read the article <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/article/CORP/powering-virtual-first-health-plans/]]> Learn about the rising costs of healthcare and how to support employees as they navigate GLP-1 medications.
Read the article <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/teladoc-health/2023/05/26/3-vital-ways-you-can-help-your-employees-navigate-new-weight-loss-medications/?sh=12536d17e8ab]]> Don't forget to stay tuned for Teladoc Health’s release of the Virtual Care Transformation Model featured on our next SHRM webinar. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
